seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'AI Data Engineer' with 1+ years of experience mentioned, but no explicit senior-level indicators in responsibilities or title.

job_family.evidence: Title includes 'AI' and core responsibilities focus on deploying AI models, integrating AI into business processes, and working with AI/ML pipelines.

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on deploying and monitoring AI models on Azure, automating workflows, and integrating APIs suggests MLOps as a sub-specialty.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role is hands-on with no direct mentions of technical leadership, mentoring, or people management responsibilities.

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure services (Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric) and Azure DevOps mentioned explicitly.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions 'data pipelines' and 'automate workflows' which could imply batch processing, but also 'deploying AI models' which may involve real-time components. No explicit streaming tools mentioned.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps mentioned, which is a cloud-native orchestrator for workflows and deployments.

storage_layer.evidence: No explicit storage layer tools or paradigms mentioned (e.g., warehouse, lake, lakehouse).

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as 'Prague, Czechia' with hybrid work model, suggesting same region or country restriction.

timezone_focus.evidence: Location is explicitly Prague, Czechia, and no global or multi-timezone team distribution mentioned.

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model mentioned, and no relocation package or requirement stated.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No signals indicating support for OPT/CPT or student visas.

citizenship_required.evidence: No discussion of work authorization, citizenship, or residency requirements in the job posting.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type not discussed beyond full-time role.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits include paid vacation, meal allowance, pension insurance, and other standard perks (e.g., Multisport card, transport allowance). No premium benefits like equity or learning budget mentioned.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'Focus on your development' with internal/external trainings, certifications, and workshops, indicating growth opportunities but no explicit career tracks.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Collaborate with senior AI developer and AI Tech Lead, suggesting mentorship opportunities.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths or advancement tracks.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility or lateral moves.

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role emphasizes hands-on work and development, but no explicit mention of management or specialist tracks beyond IC growth.

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills and experience are listed as 'must have' with no 'nice to have' or flexible language.

scope_definition.evidence: Responsibilities are well-defined and focused on AI model deployment, data pipelines, and automation.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align with mid-level seniority (1+ years of experience, Python, SQL, Azure services).
